description:
**Fix Overview**:

A recent out-of-band (OOB) update has been released to address the known issue with the system.

1. Identify the latest OOB update available for your system.
2. Download and install the update to resolve the issue.

**Details**:
Ensure that your system is fully patched and updated frequently to prevent such issues in the future. This OOB update is significant as it addresses a pressing concern regarding system performance. (LLM Synthesized)
